revised_title: Determination of the Scale Value of a Thomson's Quadrant Electrometer for Registering Atmospheric Electricity at Kew Observatory
tldr: The author describes a series of experiments to determine the scale value of a Thomson's quadrant electrometer used for registering atmospheric electricity variations at Kew Observatory. The experiments involve using a battery of Bunsen cells and a chloride of silver battery to test the deflections of the instrument at different points of the scale throughout its entire range.
